item.title: How to Safely move Logic out of Activities
item.description: In my last post, I argued that we should stop putting our app logic in Activitys and Fragments because it makes both unit testing and functional testing our apps more difficult. In this post, I’ll try to suggest a method of safely removing app logic from our Activitys and Fragments, drawing on a central idea discussed in Michael Feathers’ Working Effectively with Legacy Code: characterization tests. In the first section, I briefly introduce the idea of characterization tests.
